issue.title: [C++] Write generic filesystem tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5275](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5275). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need a suite of implementation-agnostic tests for filesystem implementations, to make it easy to validate each implementation against the expected semantics.
